text: If you die you're completely happy and your soul somewhere lives on. I'm not afraid of dying. Total peace after death, becoming someone else is the best hope I've got.
author: Kurt Cobain

text: Those who can win a war well can rarely make a good peace and those who could make a good peace would never have won the war.
author: Winston Churchill

text: If we are to teach real peace in this world, and if we are to carry on a real war against war, we shall have to begin with the children.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

text: The game is my wife. It demands loyalty and responsibility, and it gives me back fulfillment and peace.
author: Michael Jordan

text: The game of basketball has been everything to me. My place of refuge, place I've always gone where I needed comfort and peace. It's been the site of intense pain and the most intense feelings of joy and satisfaction. It's a relationship that has evolved over time, given me the greatest respect and love for the game.
author: Michael Jordan
